title: President summons Senate session on June 9
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 07 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Wednesday summoned the Senate to meet on Friday, June 9, 2023.
The Senate session will be held in the Parliament House at 1800 hours on the said date.
The president summoned the Senate session under Article 54(1) of the Constitution, a President House press release said.
